name: charliecloud

conflicts.name: platform=darwin
conflicts.description: charliecloud: This package does not build on macOS

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: docs
variants.description: Build man pages and html docs

description: Lightweight user-defined software stacks for HPC.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: git
dependencies.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.

dependencies.name: py-lark
dependencies.description: Lark is a modern general-purpose parsing library for Python.

dependencies.name: rsync
dependencies.description: An open source utility that provides fast incremental file transfer.

dependencies.name: bats
dependencies.description: Bats is a TAP-compliant testing framework for Bash.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: squashfuse
dependencies.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE
